imdb.plot outline: Hosts Ayesha Rahman and Max Geschwind each give their take on what some of their favorite films were of 2015 as well as providing reviews for the films nominated at the 88th Academy Awards. They give their predictions too on who and what film will win the big prize! All this and more on Ayesha and Max's Movie Minute!
imdb.title: Ayesha and Max's Movie Minute
akas: Ayesha and Max's Movie Minute (United States)
plot: Hosts Ayesha Rahman and Max Geschwind each give their take on what some of their favorite films were of 2015 as well as providing reviews for the films nominated at the 88th Academy _Awards_ (qv).
